boardgame.name: Dixit Odyseja
Dixit: Odyssey
Диксит Одиссея
ดิกสอิท โอเดสซี
妙語說書人3：奧德賽
boardgame.description: Dixit Odyssey is both a standalone game and an expansion (Dixit: Odyssey (expansion)) for Jean-Louis Roubira's Dixit, which won Germany's Spiel des Jahres award in 2010._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game play in Dixit Odyssey matches that of Dixit: Each turn one player is the storyteller. This player secretly chooses one card in his hand, then gives a word or sentence to describe this card_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;but not too obviously. Each other player chooses a card in hand that matches this word/sentence and gives it to the storyteller. The storyteller then lays out the cards, and all other players vote on which card belongs to the storyteller. If no one or everyone guesses the storyteller's card, the storyteller receives no points and all players receive two; otherwise the storyteller and the correct guesser(s) each receive three points. Players score one point for each vote their image receives. Players refill their hands, and the next player becomes the storyteller. When the deck runs out, the player with the most points wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dixit Odyssey contains 84 new cards, each with a unique image drawn by Pier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ocirc; and colored by Marie Cardouat, artist of Dixit and Dixit 2. The stand alone version also includes a folding game board, 6 new rabbit scoring tokens (12 total), and a box large enough to hold all the Dixit cards released to date. The stand alone version of Dixit Odyssey includes enough components for up to twelve players and also has variant rules for team play and for new ways to play with the cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expansion versus standalone versions of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Standalone version is in a square box (released in 2011 but may still be available)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Expansion version is in a rectangular box (available from 2013 onwards): Dixit: Odyssey (expansion)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Asmodee (ASM DX03US) Voyage to a new dream! The fantastic universe of Dixit, winner of the Spiel des Jahres 2010, returns to entrance you once more. With Dixit Odysset, continue the adventure in new worlds that will enchant and delight. Dixit Odyssey gives players the chance to choose the whimsical and dreamlike art that matches the storyteller’s tale, then see if they can find the storyteller’s card among all those before them. Using your imagination and wit, journey through wild and magical new worlds and rediscover the brilliance and wonder of the original. Discover 84 new illustrations by Piero and Marie Cardouat in Dixit Odyssey, the standalone game for up to 12 players that include a new, more practical scoreboard, voting pads, and new rabbit tokens. Plus Dixit Odyssey has room to store all the cards from both Dixit and Dixit 2, so you can take the whole game with you in one box. A new universe of magical worlds awaits!

new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; sealed. i also have Mayday Games_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Large Card Sleeves Size #3: 80 x 120mm that will fit the Dixit cards. It comes 100 card sleeves per pack for $3.50 buyer pays paypal fees, if any.

All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Dixit Odyssey gives players the chance to choose the whimsical and dreamlike art that matches the storyteller_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tale, then see if they can find the storyteller_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s card among all those before them. Complete 12-player Dixit Odyssey (2011 Asmodee English First Edition) with all the cards from the original Dixit and Dixit: Quest, which was the first stand-alone expansion released between the original Dixit and Odyssey. Also included is the 2011 Dixit Odyssey: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Bunny_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Pre-Order Promo Card and the 2012 Dixit: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The Dragon_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Promo Card. This is really the ideal Dixit set. It includes 254 cards from the first 3 sets, which were all by the same artist (Marie Cardouat), giving them all the same _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;feel_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;. Also, all of the cards fit perfectly in the Dixit Odyssey box and can be played by up to 12 people, whereas all more recent editions of Dixit only play up to 6. The box has some sleight wear on the corners, but is still in very good condition.

Im selling Dixit Odyssey with 3 extra sets of cards (Dixit Quest, Dixit 3 and Dixit Origins) Ive only played Odyssey once (and only bought it a few months ago) and and have never used the additional cards. Please email me if you have and more questions UK Postage is £6.50
